ja506:5.2: Hatthattamāgacchi → hatthattha māgañchi (bj); hatthatthamāgacchi (sya1ed, sya2ed); hatthattham āgañchi (pts-vp-pli1)
ja506:7.1: pañcadasiñca → paṇṇarasiñca (bj); paṇṇarasiṁ ca (sya1ed, sya2ed); pannarasiñca (pts-vp-pli1)
ja506:17.2: Saṁvaṭṭaye → saṁvaṭṭayaṁ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); saṁvatteyya (sya1ed, sya2ed); saṁvaṭṭeyya (mr)
ja506:17.3: samūlamuppate → … mubbahe (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, Ma-aka); … muṭṭhahe (mr)
ja506:19.3: Maṅkāraṇā → mama kāraṇā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja506:42.3: Ito haritvāna … karontu → ito haritvā sovaṇṇagharāni kāraya, rūpiyassa ca pākāraṁ karontu (si, sya1ed, sya2ed), ito haritvā sovaṇṇagharāni, (kāraya) rūpiyassa ca pākāraṁ karontu (pts1ed)
